original_text: None of the transgressions that he has committed shall be remembered against him; for the righteousness that he has done he shall live.
korean_text: 그 범죄한 것이 하나도 기억함이 되지 아니하리니 그가 행한 공의로 살리라

sentences.original_text: None of the transgressions that he has committed
for the righteousness that he has done
